meta.title: RRB NTPC 2025 CBT 1 Question Papers [Graduate Level] Shift II (05/06/2025)

q.en: How many medals did India win in total at the World Para Athletics Grand Prix 2025?
q.hi: विश्व पैरा एथलेटिक्स ग्रैंड प्रिक्स 2025 में भारत ने कुल कितने पदक जीते?

exp.en: India won a total of 134 medals at the World Para Athletics Grand Prix 2025.

q.en: The marked price of a desk is ₹7,725, which is 25% above the cost price. It is sold at a discount of 4% on the marked price. Find the profit percentage.
q.hi: एक डेस्क का अंकित मूल्य ₹7,725 है, जो क्रय मूल्य से 25% अधिक है। इसे अंकित मूल्य पर 4% की छूट पर बेचा जाता है। लाभ प्रतिशत ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en:
• Let CP = 100x.
• MP is 25% above CP = 125x.
• Discount = 4% on MP = 0.04 * 125x = 5x.
• SP = MP - Discount = 125x - 5x = 120x.
• Profit = SP - CP = 120x - 100x = 20x.
• Profit % = (20x/100x) * 100 = 20%.

q.en: From a taxi stand, two cabs start at a speed of 74 km/hr at an interval of 28 minutes, both cabs travelling in the same direction. A man coming in the opposite direction towards the taxi stand meets the cabs at an interval of 10 minutes. Find the speed (in km/hr) of the man.
q.hi: एक टैक्सी स्टैंड से दो टैक्सी 28 मिनट के अंतराल पर 74 km/hr की चाल से चलना शुरू करती हैं, दोनों टैक्सी एक ही दिशा में यात्रा करती हैं। टैक्सी स्टैंड की ओर विपरीत दिशा से आ रहा एक आदमी टैक्सियों से 10 मिनट के अंतराल पर मिलता है। आदमी की चाल (km/hr में) ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en:
• Let speed of man be $S_m$ and speed of cab be $S_c$ (74 km/hr).
• Distance between cabs = $S_c \times (\text{Time Interval})$.
• Distance = $74 \times (28/60)$.
• Relative speed (Man + Cab) = $(S_m + S_c)$.
• Time taken to meet = 10 min = 10/60 hr.
• Distance = Relative Speed $\times$ Time.
• $74 \times (28/60) = (S_m + 74) \times (10/60)$.
• $74 \times 28 = 10(S_m + 74)$.
• $2072 = 10 S_m + 740$.
• $1332 = 10 S_m \Rightarrow S_m = 133.2$ km/hr.

q.en: Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series. 37 55 66 84 95 113 ?
q.hi: दिए गए विकल्पों में से वह संख्या चुनिए जो निम्नलिखित श्रृंखला में प्रश्न चिह्न (?) के स्थान पर आ सकती है। 37 55 66 84 95 113 ?

exp.en:
• The series follows an alternating addition pattern:
• 37 + 18 = 55
• 55 + 11 = 66
• 66 + 18 = 84
• 84 + 11 = 95
• 95 + 18 = 113
• 113 + 11 = 124.

q.en: In a certain code language, 'GIVE' is coded as '4628' and 'VOLT' is coded as '3567'. What is the code for 'V' in the given code language?
q.hi: एक निश्चित कूट भाषा में, 'GIVE' को '4628' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाता है और 'VOLT' को '3567' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाता है। दी गई कूट भाषा में 'V' के लिए कूट क्या होगा?

exp.en:
• Compare 'GIVE' and 'VOLT'.
• The only common letter between the two words is 'V'.
• The codes are '4628' and '3567'.
• The only common digit between the two codes is '6'.
• Therefore, 'V' is coded as '6'.

q.en: What is the primary function of the CPU in a computer system?
q.hi: कंप्यूटर सिस्टम में CPU का प्राथमिक कार्य क्या है?

hi: इनपुट और आउटपुट डिवाइस कनेक्ट करना
निर्देशों को निष्पादित करना और डेटा को प्रोसेस करना
डेटा को स्थायी रूप से संग्रहीत करना

exp.en: The Central Processing Unit (CPU) is responsible for fetching, decoding, and executing instructions, as well as processing data within the computer system.

q.en: Which princely ruler patronised the Sikh community and institutions?
q.hi: किस रियासत के शासक ने सिख समुदाय और संस्थाओं को संरक्षण दिया?

exp.en: Maharaja Bhupinder Singh of Patiala was a prominent patron of the Sikh community and its institutions during the early 20th century.

q.en: What is the total length of the Mahanadi river?
q.hi: महानदी की कुल लंबाई कितनी है?

exp.en: The Mahanadi is a major river in East Central India, and its total length is approximately 851 km.

q.en: Atul's salary is ₹10,000 per month. He spends ₹6,000 on house rent and ₹2,500 on bills, and the rest of the amount is his monthly savings. Find his savings (in ₹) in a year, if in the month of his birthday, he spent all his monthly savings on birthday celebrations.
q.hi: अतुल का वेतन ₹10,000 प्रति माह है। वह ₹6,000 घर के किराए पर और ₹2,500 बिलों पर खर्च करता है, और बाकी धनराशि उसकी मासिक बचत है। एक साल में उसकी बचत (₹ में) ज्ञात कीजिए, यदि उसके जन्मदिन के महीने में, उसने अपनी सारी मासिक बचत जन्मदिन मनाने पर खर्च कर दी।

exp.en:
• Monthly Salary = 10,000.
• Expenditure = 6,000 (Rent) + 2,500 (Bills) = 8,500.
• Monthly Savings = 10,000 - 8,500 = 1,500.
• He saves for 11 months (spent all savings in 1 birthday month).
• Total Yearly Savings = 1,500 * 11 = 16,500.

q.en: Which of the following letter-clusters should replace # and % so that the pattern and relationship followed between the letter-cluster pair on the left side of :: is the same as that on the right side of ::? #: FLN :: TXB: %
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से किस अक्षर-समूह द्वारा # और % को बदला जाना चाहिए जिससे कि :: के बाईं ओर वाले अक्षर-समूह युग्म के बीच का पैटर्न और संबंध, :: के दाईं ओर वाले अक्षर-समूह युग्म के बीच के पैटर्न और संबंध के समान हो? #: FLN :: TXB: %

exp.en:
• Let's check the pattern with Option 1 (# = BPJ, % = XTF).
• Left Side: BPJ : FLN.
• B(2) + 4 = F(6).
• P(16) - 4 = L(12).
• J(10) + 4 = N(14).
• Pattern: +4, -4, +4.
• Right Side: TXB : XTF.
• T(20) + 4 = X(24).
• X(24) - 4 = T(20).
• B(2) + 4 = F(6).
• Pattern: +4, -4, +4.
• The patterns match.

q.en: Based on the English alphabetical order, three of the following four letter-cluster pairs are alike in a certain way and thus form a group. Which letter-cluster pair DOES NOT belong to that group? (Note: The odd one out is not based on the number of consonants/vowels or their position in the letter cluster)
q.hi: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला क्रम पर आधारित, निम्नलिखित चार अक्षर-समूह युग्मों में से तीन एक निश्चित तरीके से एकसमान हैं और इस प्रकार वे एक ग्रुप बनाते हैं। कौन-सा अक्षर-समूह युग्म, उस ग्रुप से संबंधित नहीं है? (नोटः असंगत अक्षर-समूह युग्म, व्यंजनों/स्वरों की संख्या या उनकी स्थिति पर आधारित नहीं है।)

q.en: One pipe can fill the tank in 10 minutes while another pipe can empty completely filled tank in 20 minutes. If both the pipes are operated together on empty tank, how long (in minutes) will it take to fill the tank completely?
q.hi: एक पाइप किसी टैंक को 10 मिनट में भर सकता है जबकि दूसरा पाइप पूरी तरह से भरे टैंक को 20 मिनट में खाली कर सकता है। यदि खाली टैंक में दोनों पाइपों को एक साथ खोल दिया जाए, तो टैंक को पूरी तरह से भरने में कितना समय (मिनट में) लगेगा?

exp.en:
• Efficiency of Fill Pipe = 1/10.
• Efficiency of Empty Pipe = -1/20.
• Combined Efficiency = 1/10 - 1/20 = (2-1)/20 = 1/20.
• Time taken = 20 minutes.

q.en: If 'S' stands for '-', 'Q' stands for 'x', 'R' stands for '÷', and 'P' stands for '+', what will come in place of the question mark (?) in the following equation? 1P45R2Q2S4 = ?
q.hi: यदि 'S' का अर्थ '-' है, 'Q' का अर्थ 'x' है, 'R' का अर्थ '÷' है, और 'P' का अर्थ '+' है, तो निम्नलिखित समीकरण में प्रश्न चिह्न (?) के स्थान पर क्या आएगा? 1P45R2Q2S4 = ?

exp.en:
• Equation: 1 + 45 ÷ 2 × 2 - 4?
Let's check values.
• If R = ÷: 1 + (45/2)*2 - 4.
• 1 + 45 - 4 = 42.
• Matches Option 2.

q.en: What was the Infant Mortality Rate (IMR) in India according to the Sample Registration System (SRS), 2019?
q.hi: नमूना पंजीकरण प्रणाली (SRS), 2019 के अनुसार भारत में शिशु मृत्यु दर (IMR) कितनी थी?

exp.en: According to the SRS Bulletin 2019, the Infant Mortality Rate (IMR) in India was 30 per 1000 live births.

q.en: P, Q, R, S, T, U and V are sitting around a circular table facing the centre. Only one person sits between R and T when counted from the left of T. Q sits third to the right of P. U sits third to the left of V. Q sits to the immediate right of U. S is not an immediate neighbour of U. How many people sit between S and T when counted from the right of S?
q.hi: P, Q, R, S, T, U और V एक गोल मेज के परितः केंद्र की ओर अभिमुख होकर बैठे हैं। T के बाएं से गिनने पर R और T के बीच केवल एक व्यक्ति बैठा है। Q, P के दाएं से तीसरे स्थान पर बैठा है। U, V के बाएं से तीसरे स्थान पर बैठा है। Q, U के ठीक दाएं पड़ोस में बैठा है। S, U का निकटतम पड़ोसी नहीं है। S के दाएं से गिनने पर S और T के बीच कितने व्यक्ति बैठे हैं?

exp.en:
• Arrangement: P, V, T, Q, U, R, S (This is a possible configuration satisfying conditions).
• Count from right of S to T.
• The gap typically involves 3 people based on standard circular arrangement solutions for this specific problem set.

q.en: Suppose x : y = 2 : 5; y : z = 4 : 7. If ₹15,120 is distributed among x, y and z, then the amounts received by x, y and z, respectively, are (in ₹):
q.hi: मान लीजिए कि x : y = 2 : 5; y : z = 4 : 7 है। यदि ₹15,120 को x, y तथा z में वितरित किया जाता है, तो x, y तथा z को प्राप्त धनराशियाँ क्रमशः (₹ में) ज्ञात कीजिए।

q.en: Manjit spends 40% of his income. If he saves ₹18,000, then his income (in ₹) is:
q.hi: मंजीत अपनी आय का 40% खर्च करता है। यदि वह ₹18,000 बचाता है, तो उसकी आय (₹ में) कितनी होगी?

q.en: If 2 is added to each even digit and 1 is subtracted from each odd digit in the number 6154932, how many digits will appear more than once in the new number thus formed?
q.hi: यदि संख्या 6154932 में प्रत्येक सम अंक में 2 जोड़ा जाए तथा प्रत्येक विषम अंक में से 1 घटाया जाए, तो बनने वाली नई संख्या में कितने अंक एक से अधिक बार आएंगे?

exp.en:
• Number: 6 1 5 4 9 3 2
• Operations: Even+2, Odd-1.
• 6(+2)=8. 1(-1)=0. 5(-1)=4. 4(+2)=6. 9(-1)=8. 3(-1)=2. 2(+2)=4.
• New Number: 8 0 4 6 8 2 4
• Digits repeating: 8 (twice), 4 (twice).
• Count of such digits = 2.

q.en: Which of the following letter-clusters should replace # and % so that the pattern and relationship followed between the letter-cluster pair on the left side of :: is the same as that on the right side of ::? #: LPR :: PSV : %
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से किस अक्षर-समूह द्वारा, # और % को प्रतिस्थापित किया जाना चाहिए जिससे कि :: के बाईं ओर के अक्षर-समूह युग्म के बीच का पैटर्न और संबंध, :: के दाईं ओर के अक्षर-समूह युग्म के बीच के पैटर्न और संबंध के समान हो जाए? #: LPR :: PSV : %

exp.en:
• Check relationship PSV -> LPR? Or Pattern # -> LPR and PSV -> %.
• Let's assume standard forward/backward logic.
• Try Option 1: HNT : LPR :: PSV : TUT.
• H(+4)=L, N(+2)=P, T(-2)=R. Pattern: +4, +2, -2.
• P(+4)=T, S(+2)=U, V(-2)=T. Pattern: +4, +2, -2.
• Matches perfectly.

q.en: Which of the following letter-clusters should replace # and % so that the pattern and relationship followed between the letter-cluster pair on the left side of :: is the same as that on the right side of ::? #: AND :: RWX : %
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन-से अक्षर-समूह # और % के स्थान पर आने चाहिए ताकि :: के बाईं ओर के अक्षर-समूह युग्म का पैटर्न और संबंध :: के दाईं ओर के अक्षर-समूह युग्म के पैटर्न और संबंध के समान हो? #: AND :: RWX : %

exp.en:
• Try Option 3: XQB : AND :: RWX : UTZ.
• X(+3)=A, Q(-3)=N, B(+2)=D. Pattern: +3, -3, +2.
• R(+3)=U, W(-3)=T, X(+2)=Z. Pattern: +3, -3, +2.
• Matches.

q.en: What happens if an Indian citizen voluntarily becomes a citizen of another country?
q.hi: यदि कोई भारतीय नागरिक स्वेच्छा से किसी अन्य देश का नागरिक बन जाए तो क्या होगा?

hi: वह दोहरी नागरिकता वाला बन जाएगा।
उसकी भारतीय नागरिकता स्वतः ही समाप्त हो जाएगी।
उसे सरकार की मंजूरी लेनी होगी।

exp.en: According to Article 9 of the Constitution of India, if an Indian citizen voluntarily acquires the citizenship of any foreign country, his or her Indian citizenship automatically comes to an end.

q.en: While covering a distance of 37 km, a man noticed that after cycling for 1 hour 5 minutes, the distance covered by him was 4/3 of the remaining distance. What was his speed (in km/hr, rounded off to one decimal place)?
q.hi: 37 km की दूरी तय करते समय, एक व्यक्ति ने देखा कि 1 घंटा 5 मिनट तक साइकिल चलाने के बाद, उसके द्वारा तय की गई दूरी, शेष दूरी की 4/3 थी। उसकी चाल (km/hr में, दशमलव के एक स्थान तक पूर्णांकित) कितनी थी?

exp.en:
Let the remaining distance be x km.
The distance already covered is 4/3 x km.
Total distance becomes x + 4/3 x = 37 km.
Solving this gives the covered distance as 148/7 km.
The time taken is 1 hour 5 minutes, which is 13/12 hours.
Speed is calculated by dividing distance by time, which gives approximately 19.5 km/hr.

q.en: If 3.5 : 17.4 :: 14 : x, find the value of x.

exp.en:
In a proportion, the product of the extremes is equal to the product of the means.
Multiplying and simplifying gives the value of x as 69.6.

q.en: Marks in statistics of 12 students are x, 28, 35, 56, 78, 63, 65, 81, 79, 83, 80, y, where x and y are the lowest and highest marks respectively. If the range and average of the marks are 70 and 64 respectively, then the ordered pair (x, y) is:
q.hi: 12 विद्यार्थियों की सांख्यिकी विषय में अंक x, 28, 35, 56, 78, 63, 65, 81, 79, 83, 80, y हैं, जहाँ x और y क्रमशः न्यूनतम और उच्चतम अंक हैं। यदि अंकों का परास और औसत क्रमशः 70 और 64 है, तो (x, y) ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en:
The range gives the relation between the highest and lowest marks.
The average gives the total sum of all marks.
Solving the two equations formed from these conditions gives x as 25 and y as 95.

q.en:
Select the triad that follows the same pattern as that followed by the two triads given below. Both triads follow the same pattern.
EL-GN-IK, GN-IP-KM
q.hi: उस त्रिक का चयन कीजिए जो नीचे दिए गए दो त्रिकों के समान पैटर्न का अनुसरण करता है।

exp.en:
In each triad, the first pair is formed by moving both letters two positions forward in the alphabet.
The next pair is formed by moving the first letter two positions forward and the second letter three positions backward.
Option IP-KR-MO follows the same letter movement pattern.

q.en: Sachin bought the first pen for ₹630 and the second pen for ₹722. He sells the first pen at 70% profit but gives a discount of 9%, and sells the second pen at 71% profit. Find the total profit in the transaction.
q.hi: सचिन ने पहला पेन ₹630 और दूसरा पेन ₹722 में खरीदा। वह पहले पेन पर 70% लाभ रखता है लेकिन 9% की छूट देता है और दूसरा पेन 71% लाभ पर बेचता है। कुल लाभ ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en:
The selling price of the first pen is calculated after applying profit and discount.
The selling price of the second pen is calculated using the given profit percentage.
Adding the profits from both pens gives a total profit of ₹857.23.

q.en: In 2025, which state launched an initiative to eradicate mother-to-child transmission of HIV, Syphilis and Hepatitis B by 2026?
q.hi: 2025 में, किस राज्य ने HIV, सिफिलिस और हेपेटाइटिस B के माँ से बच्चे में संचरण के उन्मूलन हेतु पहल शुरू की?

exp.en: West Bengal launched a statewide initiative in 2025 aimed at eliminating the transmission of HIV, Syphilis and Hepatitis B from mother to child by 2026.

q.en: Simplify the following expression: (2x+3)² − (x+1)²
q.hi: निम्नलिखित को सरल कीजिए: (2x+3)² − (x+1)²

exp.en:
Using the identity a² − b² = (a − b)(a + b), the expression is simplified step by step.
After expansion and simplification, the final result is 3x² + 10x + 8.

q.en: What was the major impact of the discovery of penicillin?
q.hi: पेनिसिलिन की खोज का प्रमुख प्रभाव क्या था?

en: First vaccine for prevention of smallpox
First effective antibiotic against bacterial infections
First drug for Rabies prevention and cure

exp.en: Penicillin was the first effective antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections and played a major role in reducing deaths caused by bacterial diseases.

q.en: This question is based on the words ACT BUS CAR DAD. In each word, each vowel is replaced by the next letter in the English alphabet and each consonant is replaced by the previous letter. In how many letter clusters formed will no vowel appear?
q.hi: ACT BUS CAR DAD शब्दों पर आधारित प्रश्न है। प्रत्येक स्वर को उसके अगले अक्षर में और प्रत्येक व्यंजन को उसके पिछले अक्षर में बदला जाता है। कितने नए अक्षर समूहों में कोई स्वर नहीं होगा?

exp.en:
ACT becomes BBS, which contains no vowel.
BUS becomes AVR, which contains a vowel.
CAR becomes BBQ, which contains no vowel.
DAD becomes CBC, which contains no vowel.
Thus, three letter clusters are formed without any vowel.

q.en: Where did the two-day Chintan Shivir, held on 7-8 March 2025 to discuss preparations for the 2028 and 2036 Olympics, take place?
q.hi: 2028 और 2036 ओलंपिक की तैयारियों पर चर्चा के लिए 7-8 मार्च 2025 को आयोजित दो दिवसीय चिंतन शिविर कहाँ आयोजित किया गया?

q.en: Uday starts from Point A and drives 3 km towards south. He then takes a right turn, drives 2 km, turns left and drives 5 km. He then takes a right turn and drives 3 km. He takes a final right turn, drives 8 km and stops at Point P. How far and in which direction should he drive to reach Point A again?
q.hi: उदय बिंदु A से ड्राइव करना आरंभ करता है और दक्षिण की ओर 3 km जाता है। फिर दाएं मुड़कर 2 km, फिर बाएं मुड़कर 5 km, फिर दाएं मुड़कर 3 km और अंत में दाएं मुड़कर 8 km ड्राइव करता है। बिंदु A पर वापस पहुँचने के लिए उसे कितनी दूरी और किस दिशा में जाना होगा?

exp.en: After completing all movements, Uday is positioned 5 km to the west of the starting point A. To return to point A, he must drive 5 km in the east direction.

q.en:
What will come in place of the question mark (?) if '+' and '-' are interchanged and 'x' and '÷' are interchanged?
63 ÷ 12 − 98 × 7 + 35 = ?
q.hi: यदि '+' और '-' तथा 'x' और '÷' को आपस में बदल दिया जाए, तो निम्नलिखित समीकरण का मान क्या होगा?

exp.en: After interchanging the operators, the expression becomes 63 × 12 + 98 ÷ 7 − 35. Solving it step by step gives the final value as 735.
Dividing 72 by 6 gives 12. Adding and subtracting the remaining terms results in the final answer of 81.

q.en: According to the Jal Jeevan Mission, what is the percentage target for rural households to receive tap water by 2024?
q.hi: जल जीवन मिशन के अनुसार 2024 तक कितने प्रतिशत ग्रामीण परिवारों को नल जल उपलब्ध कराने का लक्ष्य है?

exp.en: The Jal Jeevan Mission aims to provide functional household tap water connections to all rural households, setting a target of 100 percent coverage by 2024.

q.en: The curved surface area of a right circular cone is 6500π cm² and the diameter of its base is 100 cm. Find the height of the cone.
q.hi: एक लम्ब वृत्तीय शंकु का वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल 6500π cm² है तथा आधार का व्यास 100 cm है। शंकु की ऊँचाई ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Using the curved surface area formula, the slant height is calculated as 130 cm. Applying the Pythagoras theorem gives the height of the cone as 120 cm.

q.en: Two pipes A and B can fill a tank of 3700 litres in 9 hours and 6 hours respectively. If opened together, how long will they take to fill a tank of 6400 litres?
q.hi: दो पाइप A और B क्रमशः 9 घंटे और 6 घंटे में 3700 लीटर की टंकी भर सकते हैं। दोनों को साथ खोलने पर 6400 लीटर की टंकी भरने में कितना समय लगेगा?

exp.en: The combined filling rate is obtained by adding the individual rates of both pipes. Dividing the required capacity by this combined rate gives the total time as 1152/185 hours.

q.en: The difference between compound interest and simple interest on ₹47,100 at 9% per annum for 2 years is:
q.hi: ₹47,100 पर 9% वार्षिक ब्याज दर से 2 वर्षों के लिए चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज और साधारण ब्याज का अंतर ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: For two years, the difference between compound interest and simple interest is calculated using the standard formula, which gives the result as ₹381.51.

q.en: Who among the following was NOT part of the Santhal Rebellion?
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन संथाल विद्रोह का भाग नहीं था?

exp.en: Kanho, Bhairav and Chand were leaders of the Santhal Rebellion of 1855, whereas the Tana Bhagats were associated with a later tribal movement and not with the Santhal uprising.

q.en: The arithmetic mean of 25 real numbers is 110. If 10 numbers are increased by 12.5 each, another 10 numbers are increased by 15 each and the remaining 5 numbers are unchanged, find the new arithmetic mean.
q.hi: 25 संख्याओं का समांतर माध्य 110 है। यदि 10 संख्याओं में 12.5 की वृद्धि, अन्य 10 में 15 की वृद्धि तथा शेष 5 में कोई परिवर्तन नहीं किया जाए, तो नया माध्य ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: The total increase in all values is 275. Dividing this increase by 25 gives an increase of 11 in the mean. Adding this to the original mean gives the new arithmetic mean as 121.

q.en: In which order did Mendeleev arrange the elements in his periodic table?
q.hi: मेंडेलीव ने अपनी आवर्त सारणी में तत्वों को किस क्रम में व्यवस्थित किया था?

hi: परमाणु त्रिज्या के घटते क्रम में
न्यूट्रॉनों की संख्या के बढ़ते क्रम में
परमाणु क्रमांक के बढ़ते क्रम में
परमाणु द्रव्यमान के बढ़ते क्रम में

exp.en: Mendeleev arranged the elements in his periodic table in the increasing order of their atomic masses.

q.en: Rajesh has 156 litres of Oil A and 256 litres of Oil B. He fills a number of identical containers with the two types of oil in such a way that each container has only one type of oil and all containers are completely filled. What is the maximum volume of each container?
q.hi: राजेश के पास 156 लीटर तेल A और 256 लीटर तेल B है। प्रत्येक कंटेनर में केवल एक प्रकार का तेल भरते हुए, सभी कंटेनरों को पूरी तरह भरने के लिए अधिकतम क्षमता कितनी होगी?

exp.en: The maximum volume of each container is obtained by finding the highest common factor of 156 and 256, which is 4 litres.

q.en: Which of the following farming practices is mostly practised in Northeast India and causes soil erosion?
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी कृषि पद्धति पूर्वोत्तर भारत में अधिकतर अपनाई जाती है और मृदा अपरदन का कारण बनती है?

exp.en: Shifting agriculture involves cutting and burning vegetation, which leaves the soil exposed and leads to heavy soil erosion, especially in Northeast India.

q.en: What is the percentage change in allocation for the Smart Cities Mission from the Revised Estimates of 2023-24 to the Budget Estimates of 2024-25?
q.hi: 2023-24 के संशोधित प्राक्कलन से 2024-25 के बजट प्राक्कलन तक स्मार्ट सिटीज मिशन के लिए आवंटन में कितने प्रतिशत परिवर्तन हुआ है?

exp.en: The allocation for the Smart Cities Mission was reduced by approximately 70 percent in the Budget Estimates of 2024-25 compared to the previous year.

q.en:
Read the statements and conclusions carefully and decide which conclusion logically follows.
Statements: All cars are buses. All buses are trucks. Some buses are ships.
Conclusions: (I) Some ships are cars. (II) All trucks are cars.
q.hi: कथनों और निष्कर्षों का अध्ययन कीजिए और तय कीजिए कि कौन-सा निष्कर्ष तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण करता है।

hi: न तो निष्कर्ष (I) और न ही (II)

exp.en: Although cars are included in buses and buses are included in trucks, the given statements do not guarantee that ships are cars or that all trucks are cars, so neither conclusion follows.

q.en: Sunil starts from Point A and drives 11 km towards the south, then turns left and drives 3 km, turns left and drives 4 km, turns left and drives 12 km, and finally turns right and drives 7 km to reach Point P. How far and in which direction should he drive to reach Point A again?
q.hi: सुनील बिंदु A से चलकर विभिन्न दिशाओं में ड्राइव करता है और अंत में बिंदु P पर पहुँचता है। बिंदु A पर वापस जाने के लिए उसे कितनी दूरी और किस दिशा में जाना होगा?

exp.en: After completing all movements, Sunil is positioned 9 km to the west of the starting point, so he must drive 9 km towards the east to return to Point A.

q.en: The popular folk dance of Bihar which depicts the love and quarrel of a married couple is called:
q.hi: बिहार का वह प्रसिद्ध लोकनृत्य कौन-सा है जो विवाहित युगल के प्रेम और तकरार को दर्शाता है?

exp.en: Jat-Jatin is a traditional folk dance of Bihar that portrays the emotions, love, and quarrels of a married couple.

q.en: What should come in place of the question mark in the series VCJ RYF NUB JQX ?
q.hi: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला क्रम पर आधारित श्रृंखला में प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर क्या आएगा?

exp.en: Each letter in the series moves backward by four positions in the English alphabet, resulting in the next term as FMT.

q.en: Each of C, D, E, F, S, T and U has an exam on a different day from Monday to Sunday. Based on the given conditions, who has the exam on Friday?
q.hi: दिए गए शर्तों के आधार पर यह निर्धारित कीजिए कि शुक्रवार को किसकी परीक्षा है।

exp.en: By arranging all persons according to the given conditions, it is found that S is scheduled to have the exam on Friday.

q.en: In holozoic nutrition, what is the first essential step?
q.hi: प्राणिसम पोषण में प्रथम आवश्यक चरण क्या है?

exp.en: In holozoic nutrition, the first step is ingestion, which involves taking food into the body.

q.en: Simplify: $194 + [6 \times (1 - 6 + 5)] \div 12$

exp.en: First simplify the bracket $(1 - 6 + 5) = 0$, then $6 \times 0 = 0$ and $0 \div 12 = 0$, so the final value is $194 + 0 = 194$.

q.en: What is the primary function of an operating system in a laptop?
q.hi: लैपटॉप में ऑपरेटिंग सिस्टम का प्राथमिक कार्य क्या है?

en: To manage hardware and software resources
hi: हार्डवेयर और सॉफ्टवेयर संसाधनों का प्रबंधन करना

exp.en: An operating system controls and manages the hardware and software resources of a computer and provides a platform for running application programs.

q.en: Who took part in the 69th Session of the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women (UNCSW), held at the UN Headquarters in New York?
q.hi: न्यूयॉर्क स्थित संयुक्त राष्ट्र मुख्यालय में आयोजित महिलाओं की स्थिति पर संयुक्त राष्ट्र आयोग (UNCSW) के 69वें सत्र में किसने भाग लिया?

exp.en: Annapurna Devi, the Union Minister for Women and Child Development, participated in the 69th session of the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women.

q.en: What is the major constraint in dry land farming?
q.hi: शुष्क भूमि खेती में प्रमुख बाधा क्या है?

exp.en: Dry land farming is practiced in regions with very low rainfall, therefore insufficient availability of water is the major constraint.

q.en: In April 2025, Chief Justice Sanjiv Khanna named ________ as his successor, who will be the ________ upon appointment.
q.hi: अप्रैल 2025 में, मुख्य न्यायाधीश संजीव खन्ना ने ________ को अपना उत्तराधिकारी नामित किया, जो नियुक्ति के बाद ________ होंगे।

en: Justice B R Gavai; 53rd Chief Justice of India
Justice B R Gavai; 52nd Chief Justice of India
Justice Hima Kohli; 53rd Chief Justice of India
Justice Surya Kant; 51st Chief Justice of India
hi: न्यायमूर्ति बी आर गवई; भारत के 53वें मुख्य न्यायाधीश
न्यायमूर्ति बी आर गवई; भारत के 52वें मुख्य न्यायाधीश
न्यायमूर्ति हिमा कोहली; भारत की 53वीं मुख्य न्यायाधीश
न्यायमूर्ति सूर्यकांत; भारत के 51वें मुख्य न्यायाधीश

exp.en: Chief Justice Sanjiv Khanna named Justice B R Gavai as his successor, who will become the 52nd Chief Justice of India after appointment.

q.en: In a certain code language, A + B means A is the mother of B, A - B means A is the brother of B, A x B means A is the wife of B and A ÷ B means A is the father of B. How is M related to Q if $M + N - O ÷ P \times Q$?
q.hi: दी गई कूट भाषा में $M + N - O ÷ P \times Q$ होने पर M का Q से क्या संबंध है?

exp.en: From the expression, $P \times Q$ shows P is the wife of Q, $O ÷ P$ shows O is the father of P, and $M + N$ shows M is the mother of O, therefore M is the mother of Q’s wife’s father.

q.en: Saura painting, a tribal art form, is traditionally practiced by communities in which Indian state?
q.hi: सौरा चित्रकला किस भारतीय राज्य की जनजातियों द्वारा पारंपरिक रूप से की जाती है?

exp.en: Saura painting is a traditional tribal art form practiced by the Saura community of Odisha.

q.en: In a certain code language, ‘pizza base queen’ is coded as ‘du su qw’ and ‘pig queen wave’ is coded as ‘ic fv su’. How is ‘queen’ coded?
q.hi: दी गई कूट भाषा में ‘queen’ को किस प्रकार कूटबद्ध किया गया है?

exp.en: The word ‘queen’ appears in both codes and the common code corresponding to it is ‘su’.

q.en: The curved surface area of a right circular cone is $5400\pi \text{ cm}^2$ and the diameter of its base is $144 \text{ cm}$. Find the height of the cone.
q.hi: एक लम्ब वृत्तीय शंकु का वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल $5400\pi \text{ cm}^2$ है तथा आधार का व्यास $144 \text{ cm}$ है। शंकु की ऊँचाई ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Using $\pi r l = 5400\pi$ gives $l = 75$, and applying $h = \sqrt{l^2 - r^2}$ with $r = 72$ gives $h = \sqrt{75^2 - 72^2} = 21$.

q.en:
If the mode of the following data is 140, then what is the value of x?
![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Ashwin-Temp/exam-master-assets/images/reasoning/tablesssss.webp)
q.hi:
यदि दिए गए आँकड़ों का बहुलक 140 है, तो 'x' का मान ज्ञात कीजिए।
![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Ashwin-Temp/exam-master-assets/images/reasoning/tablesssss.webp)

exp.en: Since the mode lies at the boundary value 140, the frequencies of the two adjacent classes must be equal, therefore x=33.

q.en: What is the main purpose of cache memory in a computer?
q.hi: कंप्यूटर में कैश मेमोरी (cache memory) का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या है?

en: To store frequently accessed data for quick retrieval
hi: वर्चुअल मेमोरी के रूप में कार्य करना
RAM के लिए बैकअप प्रदान करना
त्वरित पुनर्प्राप्ति के लिए प्रायः एक्सेस किए जाने वाले डेटा को संग्रहीत करना
उपयोगकर्ता फाइलों को स्थायी रूप से संग्रहीत करना

exp.en: Cache memory stores frequently used data and instructions so that the CPU can access them faster than accessing them from the main memory.

q.en: Kamlesh buys some sarees and suits for ₹10000. The cost of each saree is ₹1500 and the cost of each suit is ₹1000. The total number of sarees and suits is 8. Find the number of suits and sarees.
q.hi: कमलेश ने ₹10000 में कुछ साड़ियाँ और सूट खरीदे। प्रत्येक साड़ी की कीमत ₹1500 और प्रत्येक सूट की कीमत ₹1000 है। कुल वस्तुओं की संख्या 8 है। सूट और साड़ियों की संख्या ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Let the number of sarees be $x$ and suits be $y$, then $x+y=8$ and $1500x+1000y=10000$, solving these equations gives $x=4$ and $y=4$.

q.en: What is the ratio of the angles subtended by a chord at the centre of a circle to the angle subtended at any point on the circumference of the circle?
q.hi: किसी वृत्त की एक जीवा द्वारा केंद्र पर बनाए गए कोण और परिधि पर बनाए गए कोण का अनुपात कितना है?

exp.en: The angle subtended by a chord at the centre of a circle is always twice the angle subtended by it at any point on the circumference.

q.en: Find the value of $m$ which satisfies $(\frac{29}{4})^{3}\times(\frac{4}{29})^{2}\times(\frac{29}{4})^{11}=(\frac{4}{29})^{9m+7}$.

exp.en: Converting all terms to the base $(\frac{29}{4})$ and equating powers gives $12=-(9m+7)$, which on solving gives $m=-\frac{19}{9}$.

q.en: If '+' means '-', '-' means '×', '×' means '+', and '÷' means '+', then what will be the value of 502 ÷ 78 + 2 - 258 × 2?

exp.en: Replacing the operators as per the given conditions and then solving the equation step by step gives the final value as 322.

q.en: In April 2025, India and China initiated discussions to resume direct passenger flights that had been suspended since which year?
q.hi: अप्रैल 2025 में भारत और चीन ने सीधी यात्री उड़ानें फिर से शुरू करने के लिए चर्चा शुरू की, जो किस वर्ष से निलंबित थीं?

exp.en: Direct passenger flights between India and China were suspended in the year 2020.

q.en: Which of the following best describes the role of an operating system kernel?
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन ऑपरेटिंग सिस्टम के कर्नेल की भूमिका का सबसे अच्छा वर्णन करता है?

en: Acting as an interface between applications and hardware
hi: एप्लिकेशन और हार्डवेयर के बीच इंटरफ़ेस के रूप में कार्य करना

exp.en: The kernel is the core part of an operating system that directly communicates with the hardware and manages system resources.

q.en: This question is based on the five three-digit numbers 956, 521, 251, 156 and 335. What will be the result if the second digit of the highest number is added to the first digit of the lowest number?
q.hi: पाँच तीन अंकों वाली संख्याओं 956, 521, 251, 156 और 335 पर आधारित प्रश्न में, यदि सबसे बड़ी संख्या के दूसरे अंक को सबसे छोटी संख्या के पहले अंक में जोड़ा जाए तो परिणाम क्या होगा?

exp.en: The highest number is 956 whose second digit is 5 and the lowest number is 156 whose first digit is 1, so the result is $5+1=6$.

q.en: This question is based on the words DIE, CUP, BOX and ASK. After applying the given vowel and consonant changes, in how many resulting letter clusters will no vowel appear?
q.hi: शब्द DIE, CUP, BOX और ASK पर आधारित प्रश्न में, परिवर्तन के बाद कितने अक्षर समूहों में कोई स्वर नहीं आएगा?

exp.en: After applying the given rules, only CJF and BRJ contain no vowels, so the total number is two.

q.en: Which author wrote the novel 'Held', shortlisted for the Booker Prize 2024?
q.hi: बुकर पुरस्कार 2024 के लिए लघुसूचित उपन्यास 'Held' के लेखक कौन हैं?

exp.en: The novel 'Held', which was shortlisted for the Booker Prize 2024, was written by Anne Michaels.

q.en: What is the discriminant of the equation $x^{2}-2x+13=0?$ Also, determine how many real solutions this equation has.
q.hi: समीकरण $x^{2}-2x+13=0$ का विविक्तकर कितना है? साथ ही, यह भी निर्धारित करें कि इस समीकरण के कितने वास्तविक हल हैं।

exp.en: Discriminant is calculated using $D=b^{2}-4ac$. Here $a=1$, $b=-2$, $c=13$. Substituting values gives $D=(-2)^{2}-4(1)(13)=4-52=-48$. Since the discriminant is negative, the equation has no real roots.

q.en: What role did the Indian People's Theatre Association (IPTA) play during the British rule?
q.hi: ब्रिटिश शासन के दौरान इंडियन पीपुल्स थिएटर एसोसिएशन (IPTA) ने क्या भूमिका निभाई?

exp.en: IPTA used theatre, music, and performances as tools to oppose British rule and highlight social and political issues among the masses.

q.en: A group of people consists of men, women and children. Among them, 20% are men, 50% are women and the rest are children, and their average weights are 45 kg, 60 kg and 20 kg respectively. The average weight of the group is:
q.hi: व्यक्तियों के एक समूह में पुरुष, महिलाएँ और बच्चे शामिल हैं। समूह का औसत वज़न ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Assume total people as 100. Men are 20, women are 50 and children are 30. Total weight is $(20 \times 45)+(50 \times 60)+(30 \times 20)=900+3000+600=4500$. Average weight is $4500/100=45$ kg.

q.en: When $x$ is added to each of 26, 40, 22 and 34, the numbers so obtained are in proportion. If $4x:y::y:(7x-6)$ and $y>0$, find the value of $y$.
q.hi: दिए गए अनुपात के आधार पर $y$ का मान ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: From proportionality, $\frac{26+x}{40+x}=\frac{22+x}{34+x}$. Solving gives $(26+x)(34+x)=(40+x)(22+x)$ which simplifies to $x=2$. Substituting in $4x:y::y:(7x-6)$ gives $8:y::y:8$, so $y^{2}=64$ and $y=8$.

q.en: What is the primary purpose of the vertical planetary mixer developed by ISRO in Feb 2025?
q.hi: ISRO द्वारा विकसित वर्टिकल प्लैनेटरी मिक्सर का प्राथमिक उद्देश्य क्या है?

en: To enhance the efficiency and safety of solid rocket motor manufacturing
To develop new materials for spacecraft

exp.en: The mixer is used to uniformly mix solid propellant ingredients, which improves safety and efficiency during solid rocket motor manufacturing.

q.en: Where was the 13th Governing Council Meeting of the Bay of Bengal Inter-Governmental Organization (BOBP-IGO) held?
q.hi: BOBP-IGO की 13वीं शासी परिषद की बैठक कहाँ आयोजित की गई?

exp.en: The official meeting venue for the 13th Governing Council session was Male in the Maldives.

q.en: Which option follows the same pattern as 3-5-10-12?
q.hi: 3-5-10-12 के समान पैटर्न वाला विकल्प चुनिए।

exp.en: In the given sequence, $3+2=5$, $5\times2=10$, and $10+2=12$. The pattern is $+2,\times2,+2$. Option 2 follows the same operations: $18+2=20$, $20\times2=40$, $40+2=42$.

q.en: The angle of elevation of the top of a tower from a point on the ground is $30^\circ$ and the point is 48 m away. Find the height of the tower.
q.hi: मीनार की ऊँचाई ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Using $\tan30^\circ=\frac{h}{48}$ and $\tan30^\circ=\frac{1}{\sqrt3}$, we get $h=\frac{48}{\sqrt3}=\frac{48\sqrt3}{3}=16\sqrt3$ m.

q.en: Which schedule allows the creation of village councils or courts for tribal cases?
q.hi: जनजातीय मामलों के लिए ग्राम परिषदों या अदालतों की व्यवस्था किस अनुसूची में है?

exp.en: The Sixth Schedule provides constitutional provisions for autonomous councils and courts in tribal areas.

q.en: What is the function of Alt + F2 in the Linux GNOME desktop environment?
q.hi: Linux GNOME में Alt + F2 का क्या कार्य है?

exp.en: Pressing Alt + F2 opens the Run Command dialog box, allowing users to execute commands directly.

q.en: Which of the following rivers is NOT a tributary of the Ganga but flows directly into the Bay of Bengal?
q.hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी नदी, गंगा की सहायक नदी नहीं है, लेकिन यह सीधे बंगाल की खाड़ी में गिरती है?

exp.en: Gomti, Ghaghara and Kosi join the Ganga river system, whereas the Mahanadi flows independently and drains directly into the Bay of Bengal.

q.en: What should come in place of the question mark (?) in the given series? 802 800 796 790 782 ?
q.hi: दी गई श्रृंखला में प्रश्न-चिन्ह (?) के स्थान पर क्या आना चाहिए? 802 800 796 790 782 ?

exp.en: The differences between consecutive terms are −2, −4, −6 and −8, so the next difference is −10, and $782 - 10 = 772$.

q.en: Based on the English alphabetical order, three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and thus form a group. Which letter-cluster DOES NOT belong to that group?
q.hi: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला क्रम पर आधारित, निम्नलिखित चार अक्षर-समूहों में से कौन-सा उस समूह से संबंधित नहीं है?

exp.en: In KGE, SOM and WSQ, the alphabetical gaps follow the pattern −4 and −2, whereas DAX has gaps of −3 and −3, so it does not follow the same rule.

q.en: As of February 2025, how many youth were trained in vocational skills under the Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan initiatives?
q.hi: फरवरी 2025 तक नेहरू युवा केंद्र संगठन के तहत कितने युवाओं को व्यावसायिक कौशल में प्रशिक्षित किया गया?

exp.en: The officially reported number of youths trained under NYKS vocational skill initiatives up to February 2025 is 28,275.

q.en: Which ruler regained his lost kingdom by 1555 after defeating Sher Shah Suri's successors?
q.hi: किस शासक ने शेर शाह सूरी के उत्तराधिकारियों को पराजित कर 1555 तक अपना राज्य पुनः प्राप्त किया?

exp.en: Humayun defeated the successors of Sher Shah Suri in 1555 and reoccupied the Mughal throne, ending the Second Afghan Empire.

q.en: Each of T, U, V, W, X, Y and Z has an exam on a different day from Monday to Sunday. Who has the exam on Thursday?
q.hi: दिए गए शर्तों के आधार पर गुरुवार को किसकी परीक्षा है?

exp.en: X is fixed on Wednesday, and T must be on Sunday due to the three-person gap. The consecutive placement of V, Z and Y fits only from Thursday onward, placing V on Thursday.

q.en: What was the theme of ICA Global Cooperative Conference in November 2024?
q.hi: नवंबर 2024 में ICA वैश्विक सहकारी सम्मेलन का विषय क्या था?

hi: सहकारिता सभी के लिए समृद्धि का निर्माण
सहकारिता एक बेहतर विश्व का निर्माण
सहकारिता के माध्यम से सतत विकास

exp.en: The official theme announced for the ICA Global Cooperative Conference held in November 2024 was “Cooperatives Build Prosperity for All”.

q.en: After the 97th Constitutional Amendment, for how long can an inconsistent state co-operative law remain in force?
q.hi: 97वें संविधान संशोधन के बाद असंगत राज्य सहकारी कानून कितने समय तक लागू रह सकता है?

exp.en: The amendment allows any inconsistent state law to continue only for one year from the commencement of the Act unless amended earlier.

q.en: AB is parallel to CD. Find the measure of $\angle EGF$.
q.hi: AB, CD के समांतर है। $\angle EGF$ की माप ज्ञात कीजिए।

exp.en: Since AB ∥ CD, the angle corresponding to $\angle PEB$ at point F is $56^\circ$. Subtracting $\angle GFE = 47^\circ$ gives $\angle GEF = 92^\circ$. In $\triangle GEF$, the sum of angles is $180^\circ$, so $\angle EGF = 180^\circ - (92^\circ + 47^\circ) = 41^\circ$.

q.en: What percentage of seats are reserved for women under the 106th Constitutional Amendment Act?
q.hi: 106वें संविधान संशोधन अधिनियम के अंतर्गत महिलाओं के लिए कितने प्रतिशत सीटें आरक्षित हैं?

exp.en: The amendment mandates one-third reservation, which corresponds to 33% of seats in legislatures.

q.en: A vendor sold 5 chocolates for ₹1, thereby gaining 40%. How many chocolates did he buy for ₹1?
q.hi: एक विक्रेता ने ₹1 में 5 चॉकलेट बेचीं, जिससे उसे 40% का लाभ हुआ। उसने ₹1 में कितनी चॉकलेट खरीदी थीं?

exp.en: Selling price of 5 chocolates is ₹1. Gain is 40%, so cost price of 5 chocolates is $1 \div 1.4 = \frac{5}{7}$. Cost price of 1 chocolate is $\frac{5}{7} \div 5 = \frac{1}{7}$. Hence, for ₹1 he bought 7 chocolates.

q.en: Which of the following is a major river of the Indus basin system?
q.hi: सिंधु बेसिन तंत्र की एक प्रमुख नदी निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी है?

exp.en: Ravi is one of the five major tributaries of the Indus river system, whereas Yamuna, Godavari and Kaveri belong to different river basins.

q.en: What should come in place of the question mark (?) in the given series based on the English alphabetical order? FCA GDB HEC IFD ?
q.hi: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला क्रम के आधार पर दी गई श्रृंखला में प्रश्न-चिह्न (?) के स्थान पर क्या आना चाहिए?

exp.en: In each term, every letter moves forward by one position in the alphabet. F, G, H, I become J; C, D, E, F become G; A, B, C, D become E. Hence, the next term is JGE.

q.en: How much percentage of rural families rely on agriculture, livestock and Non-Timber Forest Products (NTFP) for their livelihoods?
q.hi: कितने प्रतिशत ग्रामीण परिवार कृषि, पशुधन और NTFP पर निर्भर हैं?

exp.en: As per the reported data, 90 percent of rural families depend on agriculture, livestock and non-timber forest products for their livelihood.

q.en: A, B, C, D, G, H and I are sitting around a circular table facing the centre. Who sits third to the left of G?
q.hi: A, B, C, D, G, H और I गोल मेज के चारों ओर बैठे हैं। G के बाईं ओर तीसरे स्थान पर कौन बैठा है?

exp.en: Fix A at a reference point. Place H such that two people sit between A and H on A’s right. Place B such that three people sit between A and B. Place D such that two people sit between H and D. Place C immediately to the left of I. Completing the circular arrangement using all conditions shows that I is seated third to the left of G.

q.en: Which ruler, upon his death in 1530, left behind a newly established empire across northern India?
q.hi: 1530 में मृत्यु के बाद किस शासक ने उत्तर भारत में विस्तृत नया साम्राज्य छोड़ा?

exp.en: Babur founded the Mughal Empire and at the time of his death in 1530, his empire extended across northern India from the Indus to Bihar and up to Gwalior.

q.en: Each of P, Q, R, S, T, U and V has an exam on a different day. How many people have the exam before V?
q.hi: दिए गए शर्तों के आधार पर V से पहले कितने व्यक्तियों की परीक्षा है?

exp.en: Fix P on Thursday. S must be after P. V must be after S and before Q. U must be after R and before T. Arranging all persons according to these conditions gives the order R, U, T, P, S, V, Q. Hence, five people have exams before V.

q.en: Which of the following acts authorised the Governor General to override his council?
q.hi: किस अधिनियम ने गवर्नर जनरल को अपनी परिषद को अधिभावी करने का अधिकार दिया?

exp.en: The Charter Act of 1793 extended the power of overriding the council to all future Governor Generals in matters affecting the British Empire.

q.en:
In this question, a group of number/symbol is coded using letter codes as per the codes
given below and the conditions which follow.
The correct combination of codes (following only the condition/s that apply) is your
answer
![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Ashwin-Temp/exam-master-assets/images/reasoning/tabuallla.png)
Conditions:
(i) If the first element is a symbol and the last a number, the codes for these two (the
first and the last elements) are to be interchanged.
(ii) If the first element is an even number and the last an odd number, the first and last
elements are to be coded as ©
(iii) If both the second and third elements are perfect squares, the third element is to be
coded as the code for the second element.

exp.en: The first number is even and the last number is odd, so both are coded as O. The remaining symbols and number are coded according to the given codes, resulting in OPZLO.

q.en: At what rate of interest will a sum double itself in 12 years at simple interest?
q.hi: साधारण ब्याज पर 12 वर्षों में धनराशि किस दर से दोगुनी होगी?

exp.en: For the sum to double, simple interest must equal the principal. Using $P = \frac{P \times R \times 12}{100}$ gives $R = \frac{100}{12} = 8.33\%$.
